sources.name: GoldandBlack.com
sources.notes: Purdue-focused beat (MBB + FB). Premium articles exist but feed still headlines Purdue hoops.

sources.name: On3 Purdue Basketball
sources.notes: On3 Purdue MBB team feed (roster, recruiting, Painter, game notes).

sources.name: 247Sports Purdue Basketball
sources.notes: Purdue 247 Hoops — staff/scouting, recruiting, postgame reaction. Mixed football, we'll filter in code.

sources.name: Purdue Athletics MBB
sources.notes: Official Purdue men’s basketball SID feed: game recaps, quotes, injury/availability, awards.

sources.name: Yahoo Sports College Basketball
sources.notes: National. We down-rank anything not mentioning Purdue, Boilers, Painter, Braden Smith, Zach Edey, etc.

sources.name: ESPN Purdue MBB
sources.notes: ESPN’s Purdue team page. No clean RSS historically, but very Purdue-targeted. Scrape headline list.

sources.name: CBS Sports College Basketball
sources.notes: CBS national CBB. Still relevant for Painter / Purdue ranking / Big Ten talk.

sources.name: Sports Illustrated Purdue (SI Purdue / Boilermakers)
sources.notes: SI Purdue vertical: postgame takeaways, roster news, transfer portal.

sources.name: The Field of 68
sources.notes: National hoops / interviews. We'll keep but low score unless Purdue/Big Ten is in title/desc.

sources.name: USA Today Purdue Boilermakers
sources.notes: USA Today Purdue vertical (game takeaways, national-seed talk, Painter quotes).
